answers.answer: Can't be true.. I watched my weight close and 35 weeks and have gained only 15 lbs and my baby already weighs over 7lbs. No diabetes or other issues

Yes it all depends if you eat unhealthy let's say chips just junk food you and baby are going to gain weight and the more you gain weight harder it will get when baby comes out so just watch what you eat..

I think there is only so much you can do as mom but given many other factors babies sizes vary per person. Be it the combo of mom n dad genes or different genes in general. Some have healthy tiny babes others have big boys..lol healthy is the best end game.
Is it true if your sugar is high your baby will be premature?

question: Is it true what you eat and how much you eat depends on the baby's size? She is 1.1 pound at 20 weeks is this normal?
title: weight and size
